page.title: 17YOUNG PEOPLE'S ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are many activities children can take up in Southport.There are two main drama groups,dancing classes,swimming and gym clubs. J.T.W. is one drama group and M.G.R. is another. M.G.R.-(MERRY GO ROUND).This club has its own premises at Yellow House Lane.It is held on a Saturday morning and is run by Wendy Weldon and Jonathon Cotteral. Both of these groups do productions at least once a year.J.T.W. have recently performed"BUGSY MALONE" and M.G.R.have produced"GREASE". There is one main gym club in Southport wich about 150 children attend. Y.M.C.A.G.C.(Y.M.C.A.GYM CLUB)- This organization is run for children aged three years upwards.It is held at Birkdale High School.
